aggregationFunctions.description: Aggregation functions available on the grid.

aggregationModel.description: Set the aggregation model of the grid.

aggregationRowsScope.description: Rows used to generate the aggregated value. If filtered, the aggregated values are generated using only the rows currently passing the filtering process. If all, the aggregated values are generated using all the rows.

apiRef.description: The ref object that allows grid manipulation. Can be instantiated with useGridApiRef().

aria-labelledby.description: The id of the element containing a label for the grid.

autoHeight.description: If true, the grid height is dynamic and follow the number of rows in the grid.

autoPageSize.description: If true, the pageSize is calculated according to the container size and the max number of rows to avoid rendering a vertical scroll bar.

cellModesModel.description: Controls the modes of the cells.

checkboxSelection.description: If true, the grid get a first column with a checkbox that allows to select rows.

checkboxSelectionVisibleOnly.description: If true, the "Select All" header checkbox selects only the rows on the current page. To be used in combination with checkboxSelection. It only works if the pagination is enabled.

classes.description: Override or extend the styles applied to the component.

clipboardCopyCellDelimiter.description: The character used to separate cell values when copying to the clipboard.

columnBuffer.description: Number of extra columns to be rendered before/after the visible slice.

columnHeaderHeight.description: Sets the height in pixel of the column headers in the grid.

columns.description: Set of columns of type GridColDef[].

columnThreshold.description: Number of rows from the columnBuffer that can be visible before a new slice is rendered.

columnVisibilityModel.description: Set the column visibility model of the grid. If defined, the grid will ignore the hide property in GridColDef.

componentsProps.description: Overridable components props dynamically passed to the component at rendering.

defaultGroupingExpansionDepth.description: If above 0, the row children will be expanded up to this depth. If equal to -1, all the row children will be expanded.

density.description: Set the density of the grid.

detailPanelExpandedRowIds.description: The row ids to show the detail panel.

disableChildrenFiltering.description: If true, the filtering will only be applied to the top level rows when grouping rows with the treeData prop.

disableChildrenSorting.description: If true, the sorting will only be applied to the top level rows when grouping rows with the treeData prop.

disableClipboardPaste.description: If true, the clipboard paste is disabled.

disableColumnMenu.description: If true, the column menu is disabled.

disableColumnPinning.description: If true, the column pinning is disabled.

disableDensitySelector.description: If true, the density selector is disabled.

disableMultipleColumnsFiltering.description: If true, filtering with multiple columns is disabled.

disableMultipleColumnsSorting.description: If true, sorting with multiple columns is disabled.

disableMultipleRowSelection.description: If true, multiple selection using the Ctrl or CMD key is disabled.

disableRowGrouping.description: If true, the row grouping is disabled.

disableRowSelectionOnClick.description: If true, the selection on click on a row or cell is disabled.

editMode.description: Controls whether to use the cell or row editing.

experimentalFeatures.description: Unstable features, breaking changes might be introduced. For each feature, if the flag is not explicitly set to true, then the feature is fully disabled, and neither property nor method calls will have any effect.

filterDebounceMs.description: The milliseconds delay to wait after a keystroke before triggering filtering.

filterMode.description: Filtering can be processed on the server or client-side. Set it to 'server' if you would like to handle filtering on the server-side.

filterModel.description: Set the filter model of the grid.

getAggregationPosition.description: Determines the position of an aggregated value.

typeDescriptions.GridAggregationPosition | null: Position of the aggregated value (if null, the group isn't aggregated).

getCellClassName.description: Function that applies CSS classes dynamically on cells.

typeDescriptions.string: The CSS class to apply to the cell.

getDetailPanelContent.description: Function that returns the element to render in row detail.

getDetailPanelHeight.description: Function that returns the height of the row detail panel.

typeDescriptions.number | string: The height in pixels or "auto" to use the content height.

getEstimatedRowHeight.description: Function that returns the estimated height for a row. Only works if dynamic row height is used. Once the row height is measured this value is discarded.

typeDescriptions.number | null: The estimated row height value. If null or undefined then the default row height, based on the density, is applied.

getRowClassName.description: Function that applies CSS classes dynamically on rows.

typeDescriptions.string: The CSS class to apply to the row.

getRowHeight.description: Function that sets the row height per row.

typeDescriptions.GridRowHeightReturnValue: The row height value. If null or undefined then the default row height is applied. If "auto" then the row height is calculated based on the content.

getRowId.description: Return the id of a given GridRowModel.

getRowSpacing.description: Function that allows to specify the spacing between rows.

getTreeDataPath.description: Determines the path of a row in the tree data. For instance, a row with the path ["A", "B"] is the child of the row with the path ["A"]. Note that all paths must contain at least one element.

typeDescriptions.row: The row from which we want the path.

groupingColDef.description: The grouping column used by the tree data.

hideFooter.description: If true, the footer component is hidden.

hideFooterPagination.description: If true, the pagination component in the footer is hidden.

hideFooterRowCount.description: If true, the row count in the footer is hidden. It has no effect if the pagination is enabled.

hideFooterSelectedRowCount.description: If true, the selected row count in the footer is hidden.

initialState.description: The initial state of the DataGridPremium. The data in it is set in the state on initialization but isn't controlled. If one of the data in initialState is also being controlled, then the control state wins.

isCellEditable.description: Callback fired when a cell is rendered, returns true if the cell is editable.

typeDescriptions.boolean: A boolean indicating if the cell is editable.

isGroupExpandedByDefault.description: Determines if a group should be expanded after its creation. This prop takes priority over the defaultGroupingExpansionDepth prop.

typeDescriptions.node: The node of the group to test.
typeDescriptions.boolean: A boolean indicating if the group is expanded.

isRowSelectable.description: Determines if a row can be selected.

typeDescriptions.boolean: A boolean indicating if the cell is selectable.

keepColumnPositionIfDraggedOutside.description: If true, moving the mouse pointer outside the grid before releasing the mouse button in a column re-order action will not cause the column to jump back to its original position.

keepNonExistentRowsSelected.description: If true, the selection model will retain selected rows that do not exist. Useful when using server side pagination and row selections need to be retained when changing pages.

loading.description: If true, a loading overlay is displayed.

localeText.description: Set the locale text of the grid. You can find all the translation keys supported in the source in the GitHub repository.

logger.description: Pass a custom logger in the components that implements the Logger interface.

logLevel.description: Allows to pass the logging level or false to turn off logging.

nonce.description: Nonce of the inline styles for Content Security Policy.

onAggregationModelChange.description: Callback fired when the row grouping model changes.

onCellClick.description: Callback fired when any cell is clicked.

onCellDoubleClick.description: Callback fired when a double click event comes from a cell element.

onCellEditStart.description: Callback fired when the cell turns to edit mode.

typeDescriptions.event: The event that caused this prop to be called.

onCellEditStop.description: Callback fired when the cell turns to view mode.

typeDescriptions.event: The event that caused this prop to be called.

onCellKeyDown.description: Callback fired when a keydown event comes from a cell element.

onCellModesModelChange.description: Callback fired when the cellModesModel prop changes.

typeDescriptions.cellModesModel: Object containing which cells are in "edit" mode.

onClipboardCopy.description: Callback called when the data is copied to the clipboard.

typeDescriptions.data: The data copied to the clipboard.

onClipboardPasteEnd.description: Callback fired when the clipboard paste operation ends.

onClipboardPasteStart.description: Callback fired when the clipboard paste operation starts.

onColumnHeaderClick.description: Callback fired when a click event comes from a column header element.

onColumnHeaderDoubleClick.description: Callback fired when a double click event comes from a column header element.

onColumnHeaderEnter.description: Callback fired when a mouse enter event comes from a column header element.

onColumnHeaderLeave.description: Callback fired when a mouse leave event comes from a column header element.

onColumnHeaderOut.description: Callback fired when a mouseout event comes from a column header element.

onColumnHeaderOver.description: Callback fired when a mouseover event comes from a column header element.

onColumnOrderChange.description: Callback fired when a column is reordered.

onColumnResize.description: Callback fired while a column is being resized.

onColumnVisibilityModelChange.description: Callback fired when the column visibility model changes.

onColumnWidthChange.description: Callback fired when the width of a column is changed.

onDetailPanelExpandedRowIdsChange.description: Callback fired when the detail panel of a row is opened or closed.

typeDescriptions.ids: The ids of the rows which have the detail panel open.

onExcelExportStateChange.description: Callback fired when the state of the Excel export changes.

typeDescriptions.inProgress: Indicates if the task is in progress.

onFetchRows.description: Callback fired when rowCount is set and the next batch of virtualized rows is rendered.

onFilterModelChange.description: Callback fired when the Filter model changes before the filters are applied.

onMenuClose.description: Callback fired when the menu is closed.

onMenuOpen.description: Callback fired when the menu is opened.

onPaginationModelChange.description: Callback fired when the pagination model has changed.

onPinnedColumnsChange.description: Callback fired when the pinned columns have changed.

onPreferencePanelClose.description: Callback fired when the preferences panel is closed.

onPreferencePanelOpen.description: Callback fired when the preferences panel is opened.

onProcessRowUpdateError.description: Callback called when processRowUpdate throws an error or rejects.

onResize.description: Callback fired when the grid is resized.

onRowClick.description: Callback fired when a row is clicked. Not called if the target clicked is an interactive element added by the built-in columns.

onRowDoubleClick.description: Callback fired when a double click event comes from a row container element.

onRowEditCommit.description: Callback fired when the row changes are committed.

typeDescriptions.event: The event that caused this prop to be called.

onRowEditStart.description: Callback fired when the row turns to edit mode.

typeDescriptions.event: The event that caused this prop to be called.

onRowEditStop.description: Callback fired when the row turns to view mode.

typeDescriptions.event: The event that caused this prop to be called.

onRowGroupingModelChange.description: Callback fired when the row grouping model changes.

onRowModesModelChange.description: Callback fired when the rowModesModel prop changes.

typeDescriptions.rowModesModel: Object containing which rows are in "edit" mode.

onRowOrderChange.description: Callback fired when a row is being reordered.

onRowSelectionModelChange.description: Callback fired when the selection state of one or multiple rows changes.

typeDescriptions.rowSelectionModel: With all the row ids GridSelectionModel.

onRowsScrollEnd.description: Callback fired when scrolling to the bottom of the grid viewport.

onSortModelChange.description: Callback fired when the sort model changes before a column is sorted.

pageSizeOptions.description: Select the pageSize dynamically using the component UI.

paginationMode.description: Pagination can be processed on the server or client-side. Set it to 'client' if you would like to handle the pagination on the client-side. Set it to 'server' if you would like to handle the pagination on the server-side.

paginationModel.description: The pagination model of type GridPaginationModel which refers to current page and pageSize.

pinnedColumns.description: The column fields to display pinned to left or right.

pinnedRows.description: Rows data to pin on top or bottom.

processRowUpdate.description: Callback called before updating a row with new values in the row and cell editing.

typeDescriptions.newRow: Row object with the new values.
typeDescriptions.oldRow: Row object with the old values.
typeDescriptions.Promise<R> | R: The final values to update the row.

rowBuffer.description: Number of extra rows to be rendered before/after the visible slice.

rowCount.description: Set the total number of rows, if it is different from the length of the value rows prop. If some rows have children (for instance in the tree data), this number represents the amount of top level rows.

rowGroupingColumnMode.description: If single, all the columns that are grouped are represented in the same grid column. If multiple, each column that is grouped is represented in its own grid column.

rowGroupingModel.description: Set the row grouping model of the grid.

rowHeight.description: Sets the height in pixel of a row in the grid.

rowModesModel.description: Controls the modes of the rows.

rowReordering.description: If true, the reordering of rows is enabled.

rows.description: Set of rows of type GridRowsProp.

rowSelection.description: If false, the row selection mode is disabled.

rowSelectionModel.description: Sets the row selection model of the grid.

rowsLoadingMode.description: Loading rows can be processed on the server or client-side. Set it to 'client' if you would like enable infnite loading. Set it to 'server' if you would like to enable lazy loading. * @default "client"

rowSpacingType.description: Sets the type of space between rows added by getRowSpacing.

rowThreshold.description: Number of rows from the rowBuffer that can be visible before a new slice is rendered.

scrollbarSize.description: Override the height/width of the grid inner scrollbar.

scrollEndThreshold.description: Set the area in px at the bottom of the grid viewport where onRowsScrollEnd is called.

showCellVerticalBorder.description: If true, the vertical borders of the cells are displayed.

showColumnVerticalBorder.description: If true, the right border of the column headers are displayed.

slotProps.description: Overridable components props dynamically passed to the component at rendering.

sortingMode.description: Sorting can be processed on the server or client-side. Set it to 'client' if you would like to handle sorting on the client-side. Set it to 'server' if you would like to handle sorting on the server-side.

sortingOrder.description: The order of the sorting sequence.

sortModel.description: Set the sort model of the grid.

sx.description: The system prop that allows defining system overrides as well as additional CSS styles.

throttleRowsMs.description: If positive, the Grid will throttle updates coming from apiRef.current.updateRows and apiRef.current.setRows. It can be useful if you have a high update rate but do not want to do heavy work like filtering / sorting or rendering on each individual update.

treeData.description: If true, the rows will be gathered in a tree structure according to the getTreeDataPath prop.

unstable_cellSelection.description: If true, the cell selection mode is enabled.

unstable_cellSelectionModel.description: Set the cell selection model of the grid.

unstable_headerFilters.description: If true, enables the data grid filtering on header feature.

unstable_ignoreValueFormatterDuringExpor.description: If true, the grid will not use valueFormatter when exporting to CSV or copying to clipboard. If an object is provided, you can choose to ignore the valueFormatter for CSV export or clipboard export.

unstable_onCellSelectionModelChange.description: Callback fired when the selection state of one or multiple cells changes.

typeDescriptions.cellSelectionModel: Object in the shape of GridCellSelectionModel containing the selected cells.

unstable_splitClipboardPastedText.description: The function is used to split the pasted text into rows and cells.

typeDescriptions.text: The text pasted from the clipboard.

actionsCell.nodeName: the root element of the cell with type="actions"

aggregationColumnHeader.nodeName: the root element of the column header

aggregationColumnHeader--alignLeft.nodeName: the root element of the header

aggregationColumnHeader--alignCenter.nodeName: the root element of the header

aggregationColumnHeader--alignRight.nodeName: the root element of the header

aggregationColumnHeaderLabel.nodeName: the aggregation label in the column header

booleanCell.nodeName: the icon of the boolean cell

cell--editing.conditions: the cell is in edit mode

cell--withRenderer.conditions: the cell has a custom renderer

cell--rangeTop.conditions: it is at the top edge of a cell selection range

cell--rangeBottom.conditions: it is at the bottom edge of a cell selection range

cell--rangeLeft.conditions: it is at the left edge of a cell selection range

cell--rangeRight.conditions: it is at the right edge of a cell selection range

cellContent.nodeName: the element that wraps the cell content

columnHeader--numeric.conditions: the type of the column is number

columnHeader--filtered.conditions: the column has a filter applied to it

columnHeaderDraggableContainer.nodeName: the column header's draggable container element

rowReorderCellPlaceholder.nodeName: the row's draggable placeholder element inside the special row reorder cell

columnHeaderTitle.description: Styles applied to the column header's title element;

columnHeaderTitleContainer.nodeName: the column header's title container element

columnHeaderTitleContainerContent.nodeName: the column header's title excepted buttons

columnHeader--emptyGroup.nodeName: the empty column group header cell

detailPanelToggleCell.nodeName: the detail panel toggle cell element

detailPanelToggleCell--expanded.nodeName: the detail panel toggle cell element

footerCell.nodeName: the root element of the cell inside a footer row

editBooleanCell.nodeName: root of the boolean edit component

filterForm.nodeName: the root of the filter form component

filterFormDeleteIcon.nodeName: the delete icon of the filter form component

filterFormLogicOperatorInput.nodeName: the link operator input of the filter form component

filterFormColumnInput.nodeName: the column input of the filter form component

filterFormOperatorInput.nodeName: the operator input of the filter form component

filterFormValueInput.nodeName: the value input of the filter form component

editInputCell.nodeName: the root of the input component

iconSeparator.nodeName: the column header separator icon element

virtualScrollerContent--overflowed.conditions: its height is bigger than the virtualization container

root.description: Styles applied to the root element.

row--editing.conditions: the row is in edit mode

row--dragging.nodeName: the floating special row reorder cell element

row--lastVisible.nodeName: the last visible row element on every page of the grid

rowCount.description:
Styles applied to {{nodeName}}.
Only works when pagination is disabled.
rowCount.nodeName: the footer row count element to show the total number of rows

rowReorderCellContainer.nodeName: the row reorder cell container element

rowReorderCell.description: Styles applied to the root element of the row reorder cell

rowReorderCell--draggable.description: Styles applied to the root element of the row reorder cell when dragging is allowed

selectedRowCount.nodeName: the footer selected row count element

withBorderColor.description:
Styles applied to {{nodeName}}, {{conditions}}.
Sets border color only.
withBorderColor.conditions: column header and other elements that have border

columnHeader--withRightBorder.description: Styles applied the column header if `showColumnVerticalBorder={true}`.

treeDataGroupingCell.nodeName: the root of the grouping column of the tree data

treeDataGroupingCellToggle.nodeName: the toggle of the grouping cell of the tree data

groupingCriteriaCell.description: Styles applied to the root element of the grouping criteria cell

groupingCriteriaCellToggle.description: Styles applied to the toggle of the grouping criteria cell

slotDescriptions.baseButton: The custom Button component used in the grid.
slotDescriptions.baseCheckbox: The custom Checkbox component used in the grid for both header and cells.
slotDescriptions.baseChip: The custom Chip component used in the grid.
slotDescriptions.baseFormControl: The custom FormControl component used in the grid.
slotDescriptions.baseIconButton: The custom IconButton component used in the grid.
slotDescriptions.baseInputAdornment: The custom InputAdornment component used in the grid.
slotDescriptions.baseInputLabel: The custom InputLabel component used in the grid.
slotDescriptions.basePopper: The custom Popper component used in the grid.
slotDescriptions.baseSelect: The custom Select component used in the grid.
slotDescriptions.baseSelectOption: The custom SelectOption component used in the grid.
slotDescriptions.baseSwitch: The custom Switch component used in the grid.
slotDescriptions.baseTextField: The custom TextField component used in the grid.
slotDescriptions.baseTooltip: The custom Tooltip component used in the grid.
slotDescriptions.booleanCellFalseIcon: Icon displayed on the boolean cell to represent the false value.
slotDescriptions.booleanCellTrueIcon: Icon displayed on the boolean cell to represent the true value.
slotDescriptions.columnFilteredIcon: Icon displayed on the column header menu to show that a filter has been applied to the column.
slotDescriptions.columnHeaderFilterIconButton: Filter icon component rendered in each column header.
slotDescriptions.columnHeaders: Component responsible for rendering the column headers.
slotDescriptions.columnMenu: Column menu component rendered by clicking on the 3 dots "kebab" icon in column headers.
slotDescriptions.columnMenuAggregationIcon: Icon displayed in column menu for aggregation
slotDescriptions.columnMenuClearIcon: Icon displayed in column menu for clearing values
slotDescriptions.columnMenuFilterIcon: Icon displayed in column menu for filter
slotDescriptions.columnMenuGroupIcon: Icon displayed in column menu for grouping
slotDescriptions.columnMenuHideIcon: Icon displayed in column menu for hiding column
slotDescriptions.columnMenuIcon: Icon displayed on the side of the column header title to display the filter input component.
slotDescriptions.columnMenuManageColumnsIcon: Icon displayed in column menu for showing all columns
slotDescriptions.columnMenuPinLeftIcon: Icon displayed in column menu for left pinning
slotDescriptions.columnMenuPinRightIcon: Icon displayed in column menu for right pinning
slotDescriptions.columnMenuSortAscendingIcon: Icon displayed in column menu for ascending sort
slotDescriptions.columnMenuSortDescendingIcon: Icon displayed in column menu for descending sort
slotDescriptions.columnMenuUngroupIcon: Icon displayed in column menu for ungrouping
slotDescriptions.columnReorderIcon: Icon displayed on the column reorder button.
slotDescriptions.columnResizeIcon: Icon displayed in between two column headers that allows to resize the column header.
slotDescriptions.columnSelectorIcon: Icon displayed on the column menu selector tab.
slotDescriptions.columnSortedAscendingIcon: Icon displayed on the side of the column header title when sorted in ascending order.
slotDescriptions.columnSortedDescendingIcon: Icon displayed on the side of the column header title when sorted in descending order.
slotDescriptions.columnUnsortedIcon: Icon displayed on the side of the column header title when unsorted.
slotDescriptions.columnsPanel: GridColumns panel component rendered when clicking the columns button.
slotDescriptions.densityComfortableIcon: Icon displayed on the "comfortable" density option in the toolbar.
slotDescriptions.densityCompactIcon: Icon displayed on the compact density option in the toolbar.
slotDescriptions.densityStandardIcon: Icon displayed on the standard density option in the toolbar.
slotDescriptions.detailPanelCollapseIcon: Icon displayed on the detail panel toggle column when expanded.
slotDescriptions.detailPanelExpandIcon: Icon displayed on the detail panel toggle column when collapsed.
slotDescriptions.exportIcon: Icon displayed on the open export button present in the toolbar by default.
slotDescriptions.filterPanel: Filter panel component rendered when clicking the filter button.
slotDescriptions.filterPanelAddIcon: Icon displayed for deleting the filter from filter panel.
slotDescriptions.filterPanelDeleteIcon: Icon displayed for deleting the filter from filter panel.
slotDescriptions.filterPanelRemoveAllIcon: Icon displayed for deleting all the active filters from filter panel.
slotDescriptions.footer: Footer component rendered at the bottom of the grid viewport.
slotDescriptions.footerRowCount: Row count component rendered in the footer
slotDescriptions.groupingCriteriaCollapseIcon: Icon displayed on the grouping column when the children are expanded
slotDescriptions.groupingCriteriaExpandIcon: Icon displayed on the grouping column when the children are collapsed
slotDescriptions.headerFilterCell: Component responsible for showing menu adornment in Header filter row
slotDescriptions.headerFilterMenu: Component responsible for showing menu in Header filter row
slotDescriptions.loadIcon: Icon displayed on the input while processing.
slotDescriptions.loadingOverlay: Loading overlay component rendered when the grid is in a loading state.
slotDescriptions.moreActionsIcon: Icon displayed on the actions column type to open the menu.
slotDescriptions.noResultsOverlay: No results overlay component rendered when the grid has no results after filtering.
slotDescriptions.noRowsOverlay: No rows overlay component rendered when the grid has no rows.
slotDescriptions.openFilterButtonIcon: Icon displayed on the open filter button present in the toolbar by default.
slotDescriptions.pagination: Pagination component rendered in the grid footer by default.
slotDescriptions.panel: Panel component wrapping the filters and columns panels.
slotDescriptions.preferencesPanel: PreferencesPanel component rendered inside the Header component.
slotDescriptions.quickFilterClearIcon: Icon displayed on the quick filter reset input.
slotDescriptions.quickFilterIcon: Icon displayed on the quick filter input.
slotDescriptions.rowReorderIcon: Icon displayed on the reorder column type to reorder a row.
slotDescriptions.skeletonCell: Component rendered for each skeleton cell.
slotDescriptions.toolbar: Toolbar component rendered inside the Header component.
slotDescriptions.treeDataCollapseIcon: Icon displayed on the tree data toggling column when the children are expanded
slotDescriptions.treeDataExpandIcon: Icon displayed on the tree data toggling column when the children are collapsed
